column3: Latest;Phnom Penh: 151 homes were burned by fire along the railway line in Bak Touk village
column5: Russey Keo district.------According to a source
column6: the fire began at the back of a property when someone was cooking. The fire spread through the kitchen
column7: and locals tried to control it.------Residents living near the scene reported to local authorities to call the firefighters. Authorities said that no one was injured in the incident
column8: but 151 houses were completely destroyed.------Authorities said the cause of the fire was caused by a power fault. 41 fire trucks were used and the fire was completely extinguished at 3:10 am on January 6. ------TDN------UPDATE: Later reports say 15 houses and 170 rental room units were destroyed.
